segments.text: I'm looking at the boy on that stool, and my heart is in my mouth.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are splayed out at a terrible angle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks like it could go over backward at any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's so focused on the cookies, completely unaware of the danger beneath him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can picture him tumbling down, perhaps even hitting his head.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me feel quite worried for his safety.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is standing so close; she might get caught in the fall too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why isn't anyone paying attention to this unfolding hazard?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just a few feet away, lost in her dish drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a terrible situation when children are unknowingly in harm's way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to reach in and steady that stool for him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could end with tears and possibly a trip to the doctor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Such a simple everyday object becoming a source of potential injury.
segments.speaker: PAR
